name: Wrathmalos
description:
After a shipwreck leaves her stranded on a distant island, she finds herself wrapped up in a conspiracy beyond what she can handle.  

Her husband is acting strange.  A friendly drone is hinting at things beyond them.  Her bracelet is the only thing that can stop the horde.  

Nothing is what it seems on the island of Wrathmalos.

  • A surreal science fiction visual novel inspired by nightmares
  • Dialogue vaguely inspired by RPG classics
  • Turn-based combat sequences
  • Photography form Unsplash.com
  • Sound effects from Zapsplat.com
  • Music by Alexander Nakarada
